mapper.select: SELECT count(user_id) from t_meet_attend WHERE meet_id = #{meetId} GROUP BY user_id

SELECT aa.all_meet_count,bb.month_meet_count FROM (SELECT COUNT(m.id) AS all_meet_count,m.owner_id FROM t_meet m,t_meet_prop p WHERE m.id = p.meet_id and m.owner_id=#{userId} GROUP BY m.owner_id) aa LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(m.id) AS month_meet_count,m.owner_id FROM t_meet m,t_meet_prop p WHERE m.id = p.meet_id AND m.owner_id=#{userId} AND date_format(m.publish_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY m.owner_id) bb ON aa.owner_id = bb.owner_id

SELECT aa.all_attend_count,bb.month_attend_count FROM (SELECT COUNT(matd.id) AS all_attend_count,m.owner_id FROM t_meet m,t_meet_attend matd WHERE m.id=matd.meet_id AND m.owner_id=#{userId} GROUP BY m.owner_id )aa LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(matd.id) AS month_attend_count,m.owner_id FROM t_meet m,t_meet_attend matd WHERE m.id=matd.meet_id AND m.owner_id=#{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(matd.start_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY m.owner_id ) bb ON aa.owner_id = bb.owner_id

SELECT mtp.*,ml.module_name FROM ( SELECT m.id,m.meet_name,m.state,m.publish_time,m.create_time FROM t_meet m,t_meet_prop mp WHERE m.id = mp.meet_id AND m.owner_id = #{userId} ) mtp LEFT JOIN t_meet_module ml ON mtp.id = ml.meet_id GROUP BY ml.meet_id

SELECT atd.start_time,a.nickname,d.unit_name,d.sub_unit_name,a.mobile,a.username FROM t_meet_attend atd INNER JOIN t_app_user a on a.id = atd.user_id LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail d on d.user_id = a.id WHERE atd.meet_id=#{meetId} GROUP BY atd.user_id

SELECT a.id,a.nickname,d.unit_name,d.sub_unit_name,h.`level`,d.title,a.province,a.city,grp.group_name, atd.start_time,atd.end_time,atd.usetime,m.meet_name,d.cme_id FROM t_meet_attend atd LEFT JOIN t_meet m ON atd.meet_id = m.id INNER JOIN t_app_user a ON a.id = atd.user_id LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail d ON d.user_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_hospital h ON h.id = d.hos_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT g.group_name,ug.doctor_id FROM t_user_group g LEFT JOIN t_user_doctor_group ug ON ug.pub_user_id = g.pub_user_id AND ug.group_id = g.id WHERE ug.pub_user_id = #{userId}) grp ON grp.doctor_id =atd.user_id WHERE atd.meet_id=#{meetId} ORDER BY atd.user_id

SELECT atd.*,g.group_name,r.function_id,r.complete_progress,r.used_time FROM v_attend_meet_user atd LEFT JOIN v_user_group g ON g.doctor_id = atd.id AND g.pub_user_id=#{userId} LEFT JOIN t_meet_learning_record r ON r.user_id = atd.id AND r.meet_id = atd.meet_id WHERE atd.meet_id=#{meetId} ORDER BY r.user_id

SELECT m.id,m.meet_name,m.meet_type,md.module_name,md.function_id,md.id module_id, TIME_FORMAT(TIMEDIFF(mp.end_time,mp.start_time),'%H小时%i分')as meet_time FROM t_meet m LEFT JOIN t_meet_module md ON m.id = md.meet_id LEFT JOIN t_meet_prop mp ON m.id = mp.meet_id where m.id=#{meetId}
SELECT count(0) FROM t_meet m INNER JOIN t_app_attention a on m.owner_id = a.master_id WHERE a.slaver_id = #{userId} AND m.state > 0 AND m.state < 6
